text: "The Longest Time" is a 1984 song by Billy Joel and is the fourth single from his ninth studio album An Innocent Man. It has a bit of doo-wop sounding in it. It went to number 14 in the United States, number 15 in Australia, number 18 in Ireland, number 24 in New Zealand, number 25 in the United Kingdom and number 36 in Canada. Category:1984 songs Category:Billy Joel songs
title: The Longest Time
